title: [K-12] Learning Model Design for Integrating Civic Education and Indigenous Knowledge

context.prior_knowledge: Basic civics education concepts and general understanding of Indonesian culture/society
context.additional_context: Short intensive course conducted in a smartphone-centric restricted technology environment, evaluating learner competencies through project-based assessments

learning_goals: Learners will design civic education modules integrating Indigenous knowledge by applying the ADDIE model.
Learners will develop culturally contextualized educational strategies by analyzing case studies from North Sulawesi, Indonesia.
Learners will produce mobile-optimized learning materials to effectively deliver content to large-scale audiences.

resources: Digital Resources on Indigenous Indonesian Culture
constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
